snippet: LAWRENCE--Nancy Lee (Lambie), artist, died aged 98 on April 1, 2016. Known for her gentle nature and love of family, predeceased by her husband, A. Brewster Lawrence, Jr, and survived by her sons, William Jeffrey Lawrence and Eric Alexander Lawrence; stepson, A. Brewster Lawrence III; stepdaughters, Lydia Lawrence Sohar and Valerie Lawrence Donham; five step-grandchildren and five step-great-grandchildren. A memorial service will be held at The First Presbyterian Church of Smithtown at 175 East Main Street, Smithtown, New York on April 30 at 3:00pm. In lieu of flowers, the family suggests contributions in her memory to Doctors Without Borders or to Good Shepherd Hospice Foundation, 245 Old Country Road, Melville, NY 11747. 1/3
